title: Software Engineer (Backend E-G)
description:
**What you’ll be doing:**
* Combine hands on coding with working on impactful project(s) and supporting other team members,
* Solve business problems, work cross\\-functionally and lead initiatives to improve our development process and business opportunities within Booking.com
* Take initiative to address the larger technical needs of the product you work on and always keep the customer at the center of everything you do
* Contribute to the growth of Booking.com through recruitment efforts and proactively share your knowledge to help your colleagues grow
* Represent Booking.com values, both within the company and in the external community
* Advocate for a collaborative working environment \\- turn “my ideas” into “our ideas”


**What you’ll bring:**
* You have strong programming skills and experience for more than 10 years, programming on server\\-side Java is a plus
* You have experience working with applications, distributed systems and product(s) that impact millions of customer
* You are an excellent communicator and you are able to influence and cooperate with people at all levels
* You have driven successful technical, business and people related initiatives that improved productivity, performance and quality
* You have a ‘can do’ attitude and you act proactively and not reactively
* You are creative and not afraid to step outside of your comfort zone
* You have experience with mentoring, coaching and training team members,


 formal and informal
   

  

* Working experience in building payments products is a plus


**Pre\\-Employment Screening**
*If your application is successful, your personal data may be used for a pre\\-employment screening check by a third party as permitted by applicable law. Depending on the vacancy and applicable law, a pre\\-employment screening may include employment history, education and other information (such as media information) that may be necessary for determining your qualifications and suitability for the position.*

title: Sr. SBC Developer
description:
**Description**
 Sangoma, a leader in business communications solutions, is looking for a highly skilled Sr. SBC Developer to join our dynamic team. As a reputable provider of Unified Communications as a Service (UCaaS) solutions, we are focused on delivering high\\-quality products that optimize voice and communication services for businesses around the globe. In this role, you will play a critical part in developing and enhancing our Session Border Controller (SBC) products, ensuring they meet the highest standards of performance and security.
   

  

 Your expertise in SBC technologies will drive our innovation and growth in the VoIP and telecommunications space. If you are passionate about developing cutting\\-edge solutions and making a significant impact in a fast\\-paced environment, we would love to hear from you.
   

  

**Your Role**
* Design and develop robust Session Border Controller solutions to facilitate secure and reliable VoIP communication.
* Manage the integration of SBC products with various telecommunication systems and services.
* Optimize performance and scalability of SBC applications through rigorous testing and debugging.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define product specifications and requirements.
* Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies to ensure our SBC solutions remain competitive.
* Participate in code reviews, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.
* Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers on the team.


**Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a Developer with a strong focus on Session Border Controllers (SBC).
* Expertise in VoIP protocols (e.g., SIP, RTP) and understanding of telecommunications architecture.
* Experience with programming languages such as C, C\\+\\+, or Java.
* Familiarity with network security protocols and best practices.
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.


**Benefits**
* Paid Time Off


 Apply for this job
